title: Multimodal Meaning Construction in Science Classrooms: Foundations of Physics for Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic science knowledge and digital learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Multimodal resource provision considering linguistic diversity and operation of asynchronous discussion boards

learning_goals: Students can explain basic principles of physical phenomena (e.g., sound) using multimodal materials such as text, diagrams, and models.
Students improve their ability to convert experimental results into visual/non-visual symbols according to scientific discourse conventions.
Students can collaboratively construct scientific meaning through peer feedback and structured guidance from instructors on the LMS discussion board.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
